original_title: Life Is an Opinion, Fire a Fact
overview: Radically deconstructive in its interpretation of a famous Tarkovsky-sequence, Yasinsky reverses the original order of the sequence and blends it with white noise and hand-drawn sequences. She also ties her act of appropriation in with a suicide scene from Bresson and other, more serene images and sounds.
title: Life Is an Opinion, Fire a Fact
